titles.title: All-American Flag Act
To require the purchase of domestically made flags of the United States of America for use by the Federal Government.

bill.summary: 4/4/2011--Introduced. All-American Flag Act - Requires any flags of the United States acquired for use by the federal government to be entirely manufactured in the United States, from articles, materials, or supplies entirely grown, produced, or manufactured in the United States.
